name: @opencrvs/integration
description: A set of integration and performance tests for OpenCRVS

scripts.start: yarn build && docker run -v `pwd`/build:/build -i loadimpact/k6 run /build/k6-registration.js && docker run -v `pwd`/build:/build -i loadimpact/k6 run /build/k6-declaration.js
scripts.start:once: yarn build && docker run -v `pwd`/build:/build -i loadimpact/k6 run /build/k6-registration.js -u 1 -i 1 && docker run -v `pwd`/build:/build -i loadimpact/k6 run /build/k6-declaration.js -u 1 -i 1
scripts.start:staging: yarn build && docker run -v `pwd`/build:/build -i -e API_URL=https://api.opencrvs-staging.jembi.org/fhir -e AUTH_URL=https://auth.opencrvs-staging.jembi.org loadimpact/k6 run /build/k6-registration.js && docker run -v `pwd`/build:/build -i -e API_URL=https://api.opencrvs-staging.jembi.org/fhir -e AUTH_URL=https://auth.opencrvs-staging.jembi.org loadimpact/k6 run /build/k6-declaration.js
scripts.start:qa: yarn build && docker run -v `pwd`/build:/build -i -e API_URL=https://api.opencrvs.qa1.jembi.org.org/fhir -e AUTH_URL=https://auth.opencrvs.qa1.jembi.org.org loadimpact/k6 run /build/k6-registration.js && docker run -v `pwd`/build:/build -i -e API_URL=https://api.opencrvs.qa1.jembi.org.org/fhir -e AUTH_URL=https://auth.opencrvs.qa1.jembi.org.org loadimpact/k6 run /build/k6-declaration.js
